entry.title: Five Years On, Reels Reigns as India's Top Short-Form Video Platform
entry.summary: Findings from a new Meta-commissioned IPSOS study show that Reels across our platforms is India’s top driver of daily video consumption ahead of other surveyed platforms.

entry.title: Attach Text to Your Threads Posts and Share Longer Perspectives
entry.summary: We're rolling out a way for you to attach up to 10,000 characters of text to a Threads post.

entry.title: Instagram Launches A Microdrama Series To Encourage Gen Z To Take Creative Chances
entry.summary: Today, Instagram released a microdrama series in India to inspire Gen Z to take creative risks and bring them together. Titled ‘Party of Two’, the series follows Instagram’s ‘Anyway’ campaign from this year.

entry.title: Meta’s Kansas City Data Center and Upcoming AI-Optimized Data Centers
entry.summary: Our Kansas City data center is now operational, representing a $1 billion investment in Missouri and in our global infrastructure that brings our technologies to billions of people worldwide.
